main event: An air visual sighting of a bright round object was reported by military pilots during their flight from Charleston, West Virginia to Shaw AFB, South Carolina on December 14, 1955.
interesting points: The object appeared to be white in color at first and exhibited a bright red to brilliant white color change,It had a corona effect around it,The object was observed for 13 minutes and moved parallel to the flight path before disappearing to the south-west,Another sighting occurred a day later, with a description of a star-like object that changed colors and emitted a steady glow without blinking,The sound associated with the object resembled a long-tailed jet or rocket with large contrails.
sighted object: a bright round object and a star-like object
